actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize certain officers and employees of the Department of State and the Foreign Service to carry firearms for the purpose of protecting designated individuals.

summary.text: Authorizes security officers of the Department of State and of the Foreign Service to carry firearms for the purpose of protecting designated individuals.

titles.title: A bill to authorize certain officers and employees of the Department of State and the Foreign Service to carry firearms for the purpose of protecting designated individuals.
